import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const About = () => { return (

About BookStore

Welcome to BookStore! Our mission is to provide readers with access to a wide range of books, from timeless classics to the latest bestsellers. Whether you're an avid reader or just starting your literary journey, our platform is designed to make reading easy, affordable, and enjoyable.

Our Mission

At BookStore, we believe in the power of books to inspire, educate, and entertain. We aim to make books more accessible to people everywhere, offering a variety of free and paid books at your fingertips.

Features

  • Read Free and Paid Books
  • Simple and User-Friendly Interface
  • Responsive Design for Any Device

Contact Us

If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out to us at support@bookstore.com.

) } export default About
